title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 160.26 - Product labeling
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 160.26 - Product labeling

State Regulations

In order to assure the safe provision of services to the
public, all products used in the conduct of an appearance enhancement business
must be maintained with the original manufacturer labeling intact. All bottles
containing poisonous or corrosive substances shall be additionally and
distinctly marked as such and shall be stored in an area not open or available
to the public. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
160.26

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
